definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
